text: Sergei Semyonovich Sobyanin (; born 21 June 1958) is a Russian politician. He has been the 3rd and current Mayor of Moscow since 21 October 2010. He has been widely criticized for banning gay pride parades in Moscow. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Moscow Category:Russian lawyers Category:Khanty-Mansi Autonomous Okrug
title: Sergey Sobyanin
